column2: Your daughter [FromFrom.GetFirstName] comes to see you. She is very unhappy with the arranged marriage: '[Root.GetFatherMother] - I do not love my new husband and I will not accept this! I implore you to annul the marriage!'

As the wedding celebrations are being prepared, [From.GetTitledName] informs you that [From.GetHerHis] daughter will not accept marrying [target_spurned_spouse.GetTitledName], and [From.GetSheHe] has decided to annul the marriage!
Your daughter [target_daughter_killed_her_friend.GetFirstName] is furious with you: 'Damn you, [Root.GetFatherMother] - you killed [From.GetFirstName], I will never forgive you!'.
There is a rumor among the servants that the tragedy which befell the late husband of your daughter [From.GetFirstName] was in fact caused by her. She supposedly poisoned him in his sleep.

You receive news that your daughter [From.GetFirstName], in a heated argument in the bedchamber, drew a sword and attacked and her spouse. He apparently managed to find a weapon to defend himself but she bested him in combat and killed him!
Your daughter, [From.GetFirstName], has eloped! Worse, she seems to have made friends abroad and has settled in a castle in the realm of [From.Owner.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!

Your daughter, [From.GetFirstName], has eloped, leaving her family and home behind! And you hardly believe your ears when you are told that she has banded up with scoundrels and criminals and formed a mercenary band, which she now leads!

Your daughter [From.GetFirstName] comes to see you: '[Root.GetFatherMotherCap], I cannot abide your arbitrariness and tyranny, and your hypocritical abuse of the name of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] vexes me more than anything else. I spit on your religion and I turn my back on it!'
Your daughter [From.GetFirstName] could not abide her solitary and ignoble existence as a prisoner. Ever prone to choosing her own path, this time she has chosen to take her own life.

Your daughter [disobedient_daughter.GetFirstName] comes to see you: '[Root.GetFatherMotherCap], [target_daughter_wants_to_marry.GetFirstName] and I love each other, and I demand you allow us to marry.'
You are not thinking straight, [FromFrom.GetFirstName].
What? This is unheard of!
I didn't think you'd mind...
Who knows if such rumors are true?
Terrible, but... impressive!
What? How...?
This is intolerable!
I have raised a blasphemer and heretic!
Of course my dear, if that is what you desire.
Very well, we shall not force you.
Do not ask such absurd things of me.
The Disobedient Daughter
The Mercenary Princess
